body.p: An impairment loss shall be recognised immediately in profit or loss, unless the asset is carried at revalued amount in accordance with another Standard (for example, in accordance with the revaluation model in IAS 16 ). Any impairment loss of a revalued asset shall be treated as a revaluation decrease in accordance with that other Standard.
